response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth more than $100 to us and offers exceptional value. Considering its high quality and benefits, we're offering it to you at a special price of $110. This is a great opportunity to acquire something truly valuable at a reasonable cost. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 110}
